text:
Maria Alice Monteiro de Campos Vergueiro (January 19, 1935 – June 3, 2020) was a Brazilian actress and theatre director. She was born in São Paulo, Brazil. Her best known roles were as Delegado's wife in "O Corpo" (1991) and as Motorista in "Cronicamente Inviável" (2000).
Vergueiro died on June 3, 2020 at a hospital in São Paulo from pneumonia, aged 85.
